featured.text: If you want to borrow magazines, tapes, or CDs, you can visit the library.
In ecological terms, the chemicals of living things are borrowed from the Earth, and at death they return.

definition.zh_def: 借用，暫時取得某物以供使用，通常會在之後歸還。
definition.en_def: To take and use something belonging to someone else with the intention of returning it.
definition.example: I need to borrow a pen to sign this document.
